verbose_text: The close correspondence between the change in product formation and the transient changes in the redox state of cytochrome 579 in intact L. ferrooxidans was consistent with the minimal kinetic mechanism shown in Figure XREF_FIG B. Briefly, the iron dependent reduction of cytochrome 579 in the intact bacterium is depicted as a relatively rapid reaction, which is consistent with the observation that it is complete within the 0.5-s dead time of the mixing even when the concentration of soluble ferrous ions is only 100 muM.
